text: I just think that storytelling is
something we all do all the time to each
other you know with our friends and our
families and so on and it's it's a way
in which we understand ourselves you
know we tell each other the stories of
ourselves and that's how we know who we
are you know we are the and we are the
only creature on earth that does it know
it we we are this we are the
storytelling animal you know and and for
us it's absolutely at the center of how
we understand you know we narrate the
world we tell each other the world and
so it's a I think it's it's a great
thing the story and and and it far
exceeds I mean its greatness far exceeds
if you like professional writing you
know is it's it's a thing that everyone
does you know families have family
stories nations have national stories so
etc and those the way in which those
stories are told and retold and
remembered and added to and so on that's
how we live in the world you know so
where do I get them from stories well
there's a shop I'm not allowed to tell
you where it is it's like a trade secret
I don't know you know I mean if I knew
if I knew the answer to that question
I'd have written a lot more books
